title: Last Minute PS5 Predictions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.16.20
description:
Parris Lilly joins Greg to get in their last minute PS5 predictions, talk about Super Mario 3D All Stars reviews, and tackle PlayStation's Bloomberg rebuttal! 

Follow Parris: https://twitter.com/vicious696

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:34 - PS5 BETS! - Ignacio Rojas
00:24:55 - Housekeeping
TODAY. IS. HUGE.
Now, KFGD.
Earlier this morning, Mario 3D All-Star First Impressions with Tim and Blessing
After, Kinda Funny Gamescast on patreon.com/kindafunnygames
1 p.m. - PS5 Showcase
After PS5, PSILY as the post-show
5 p.m. - KF Nugdome
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Tom Bock, and Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:28:39 - PlayStation Says Bloomberg is Lying
00:31:49 - Super Mario 3D All Stars Review Round-Up
00:37:18 - Nintendo Online Update...
00:39:08 - AND There’s a Nintendo Direct Min Tomorrow
00:39:49 - Speaking of… kinda… Let’s Talk Mass Effect Collection
00:44:05 - BREAKING - AC and Splinter Cell Games for Oculus Quest
00:46:32 - Out today
00:47:28 -  Quip
00:49:06 -  Upstart
00:50:32 - Door Dash
 Reader mail   -
00:51:37 - “Don't you find it odd that xCloud has been completely absent from Xbox's next gen marketing?” - The Nano Biologist
00:56:39 - “I’m curious if you guys think that crossplay will be in even bigger demand than it already is.” - MangoJR
00:59:44 - Squad Up: Kevin Bogues - PS4 - KevinBogues
01:05:24 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Felicia Day!
